column5: Hi IaDave, Where are you going to in Sioux Lookout? We go to Sioux Lookout every year. Have a great Trip!!!Thank you,Larry Mac
Hey, Joeman..........can we get that walleye chimi recipe?
Headed to Timber Edge Camp which is on Butterfly Lake which connects to Minnitaki. I like to stay there in the fall and in the spring I like Winoga Lodge.
Hi IaDave, That sounds absolutely beautiful, trophy water. Have a great trip and please give us a report. Sioux Lookout is a fabulous area.Thank you,Larry Mac
Were do you go up in Sioux Lookout?
Hi IaDave, We go to Ghost River Camp on Marchington Lake.www.ghostriverlodges.com It is a boat and portage in camp. It is a very good Canadian Wilderness experience.Thank you,Larry Mac
Don't forget long johns and tip-ups
Just got back 3 hours ago. Crossing into Canada (Pidgeon River) took aboot 15 seconds and coming back into the US took about 30 seconds, without a doubt the fastest crossings in 25+ years.
DUI = checkPotatoes = checkLots of beer to drink in the boat = checkAm I forgetting anything????
Maybe the law, where are you going?
Oh, I purposely left the law out. Just kidding anyway. Getting a little feisty and am ready to get fishing!
Don't forget lots of USA leeches, worms in DIRT and American minnows! Have a great week!
might as well bring a hand gun too!! Have safe and fun trip!!
Have a great trip Sin!!!! I am gonna make walleye Chimis this weekend for my family. Thanks for the recipe! Can't wait for another Video and Report! 340 days till next trip!!
SinorSwim, Have a great trip!!!!!!!!Thank you,Larry Mac
We leave Sat. for Sioux Lookout- As of now looks like we may have gotten lucky on the weather. Could be one of the best weeks weatherwise all summer.
IaDave, You do know that you just jinxed yourself, right? Have a good time either way. Later, Jay
